title: Understanding Amazon Sales Rank for books: Know how often a book is selling on Amazon
description:
A simple formula to translate Amazon Sales Rank so you know how often a book is selling. Full article here:  https://www.fbamastery.com/whats-considered-a-good-amazon-sales-rank-for-books

This video answers these questions:

1. How do you know how often a book is selling?
2. Six basic facts about Amazon Sales Rank.
3. Two ways to measure sales without Amazon Sales Rank.
